rule.name: SingleParameterMustBeSingleLine
rule.message: Methods with 0-1 parameters should be formatted on a single line when variable or method names are too long
rule.description: Methods with 0-1 parameters should be formatted on a single line when variable or method names are too long. This prevents excessive line wrapping due to long identifiers.
